title: Having Log-in and Game Issues even after Troubleshooting -- Rito Pls? :D
body:
Hi there!

I hope some Rioter can help me, or someone who has had the same experience as me.

Since 2 days ago, it takes a while to log-in and lately I can't even do that. 
What I see on the screen is: The loading wheel of the Loading Status and besides that, in the left upper corner the League Symbol with 0% saying "Scanning" and it gets stuck in 1 file.

If I somehow manage to log-in, I'm not allowed to start a game and it also shows the 0% scanning bar. I can't even be invited by friends, it pops a message that I'm not allowed to join the queue. 
I have already done a Full Repair with the Troubleshooting, but it didn't solve anything.

I have visited the link I posted from Riot Support, and I'm still confused what should I do.
I tried to download the automated Troubleshooting and the first time it failed; now it's 3% after a long time.

Maybe some kind soul can help me out? It's frustrating that I'm in my last days of holidays and I can't enjoy the game...

Thanks!

PS: I play on the EUW Server, came here because this forum is much more active it seems :)

replies.body: Are you receiving any errors?  It sounds like your pc is blocking the patcher from scanning your game files, so no updates can be performed before taking you to the login screen.  I'm not sure which support link you went to, but you will want to specifically run through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Hi there! Thanks for your time and getting back to me.

I didn't receive any error, it just didn't want to scan. Somehow it's working again, but takes longer than usual to log-in.

Thank you again! :D
